name: getPhoneRecordings
description:
List [call recordings](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360038521091-Accessing-and-sharing-call-recordings) of an account.
**Scopes:**
* `phone:read:admin` `phone:write:admin` **Prerequisties:**
* Pro or higher account with Zoom Phone license. * Account owner or admin privileges.

page_size.description: The number of records returned within a single API call. The default is **30**, and the maximum is **100**.

next_page_token.description: The current page number of returned records.

from.description: Start date and time in **yyyy-mm-dd** format or **yyyy-MM-dd’T’HH:mm:ss’Z’** format. The date range defined by the from and to parameters should only be one month as the report includes only one month worth of data at once.

to.description: End date and time in **yyyy-mm-dd** format or **yyyy-MM-dd’T’HH:mm:ss’Z’** format, the same formats supported by the `from` parameter.

owner_type.description: The owner type. The allowed values are null, `user`, or `callQueue`. The default is null. If null, returns all owner types.

recording_type.description: The recording type. The allowed values are null, `OnDemand`, or `Automatic`. The default is null. If null, returns all recording types.

site_id.description: The site ID. The default is `All sites`.

$ul: **next_page_token**: The current page number of returned records.
**page_size**: The number of records returned within a single API call. The default is **30**, and the maximum is **100**.
